# info Gapminder
```{r}
#| title: "demo gapminder 1"
library(gapminder)
gap_2007 <- gapminder%>%
  filter(year==2007)%>%
  arrange(country)

df_gapminder_2007_america <- gap_2007%>%
  filter(continent=='Americas')

gapminder_2007 <- gapminder%>%
  filter(year==2007)%>%
  arrange(country)
gap_gr1 <- gapminder_2007%>%
  group_by(continent)%>%
  count(sort = TRUE, name='Total')%>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x=reorder(continent,-Total),
               y= Total),
           fill= "#ffbe0b")

ggplotly(gap_gr1)
```

```{r}
#| title: "demo gapminder 2"
gap_gr2 <- ggplot(data = gapminder_2007) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = lifeExp,
                           y = gdpPercap,
                           size=pop,
                           shape= continent,
  ),
  color= '#386641',
  alpha=.8)+
  theme_bw()

ggplotly(gap_gr2)
```
